{{disambig-more: '''Sideshow Collectibles''' is a company that specializes in high end collectibles such as polystone statues, Premium Format figures, 12 inch figures and has many areas of speciality items. Sideshow has a very large collection of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' products, however most of the line that was created from  [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)
Weta: ''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]] films are now unavailable.

{{disambig-more: Sideshow teamed up with [[New Line Cinema]] and [[Weta Workshop]] to create an array of almost 200 unique statues, busts, medallions, and environments that were based on the three ''[[Lord of the Rings]]'' films.
